title: Geting into dugens
body:
Hello. Does any1 alse have problems geting into the game selections.
Seems i cant even chose the dungeon i would like to play. everything stops moving (freezes) cant advance into "find game"

Theres no report of such things atm, so might be just me.

Thanks.

replies.body: I'm not exactly following you on what you mean by 'dungeons', but if you can't click 'find match' from the lobby there could be a number of issues. First, have you tried making sure that your connection is solid? Make sure there's nothing interfering with your game's connection using [**this Connection Guide**](http://riot.com/12B7oac). If you have trouble following it or you try all the steps and they don't help, just let me know. I'll try looking for some other solutions. :D
